title: Epitaph for Halaesina
support: Described as simply 'marmor candidum' by Gualtherus, with no further indications of form or state.

layout.p: presented as two lines of Latin

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, described by Gualtherus as 'in aede Mathei Bertholi Medici', and all subsequent editions are derivative.
